text:
@narendramodi Corona stats in India

* Passengers screened at airports: 15,24,266

* Total number of active COVID-19 cases: 446

* Cured/discharged: 37

* Deaths: 9

Still we can stop this virus!

Save lives by staying at home!

#StayAtHomeSaveLives
